text: IRd4 <74i4 TTTHNf_4ferarot (73v Yae7 & roTf 4A1q4, HRT TTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tn *t 4-5 & 6, #qzr-10, ErqT, # @orlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 374/Phone : 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Delegation %f Powers /2022 Policy Circular No.1.1.34/2022 dated 3 October , 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. 11014/20/2022-Admn (Comp No. 171772)} Sub.: Clarification on Sanction of Leave- reg: Order No. 11041/217/2007-Admn dated 27.08.2013 and No. Please refer Office the for sanction of leave to various 11041/11/2016-HR-[ dated 03.02.2017, prescribing officers. is clarified that Earned Leave and Commuted Leave can be sanctioned by the 2 In this regard, it Officers other than Admn Division upto the prescribed limits only: Maternity Leave and Leave on repatriation are to be forwarded to Admn 3 Child Care Leave, Division for approval: 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: Encl: As above /22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi: 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation_ # 7 7 9 NHAI Ist powers
